title: Chat bugged (order of messages)
body: I saw a fix for this somewhere but forgot where it is. Pretty much my problem is whatever i say to someone in the chat client does not go in order.

replies.body:
Hey man,

Sounds to me like your (or your friends) systems clock might be out of wack, could you try making sure your system clock is set to the correct timezone and then sync that with an Internet Time Server, there's a good guide [here](http://www.guidingtech.com/3119/windows-clock-sync/) on how to achieve that.

Let me know if this helps, thanks.
